website_summaries.verdict: Beyerdynamic's Custom Street headphones seem like they're trying to do too much, but are saved by solid, customizable audio performance.
pros: Balanced, powerful audio performance with adjustable bass response
Swappable outer earcup panels for a customized look
cons: Custom ear panels may not appeal to everyone
Could be a bit more comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Great sound! (At first but now fading)
customer_reviews.text: Buy these now! Great sound and price. Adjustable bass ports are really handy for certain songs. ***Update*** The sound quality is starting to fade. My teenage son, loved these at first but the sound is definitely starting to get tinny and hollow. Even with the bass ports open all the way they just don't sound all that good anymore. His birthday is right around the corner and I'm probably gonna be switching back to Beats for him. As he treats his items with great care.
customer_reviews.author: C. Foster

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound and Styling
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a like new pair of phones to replace a set of 30 year old Sony MDR series units. The construction quality and styling is very good, as is the fit and sound. Its true that the bass can be modified with two tabs on either side of the ear cups. The fit of the ear cups permit extended listing over more than an hour. Outside sound suppression is excellent as is imaging for the price paid. Interesting that a second set of phones can be plugged in so that a friend can listen.
customer_reviews.author: robert s

customer_reviews.title: One earcup DOA
customer_reviews.text: Received these phones today and no sound out of the left earcup. They are "refurbished suitable for resale" but apparently not. I have no idea how something as glaring as no sound out of one of the earcups could be considered suitable for resale. I'd be curious as who certified them as such and missed such an obvious defect. In case the seller is wondering, I did plug the cord ends properly and did slide the notched end in properly to each right and left earcup individually. No change, still sound from right earcup only. They are going back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Raymod J Archibald

customer_reviews.title: The best headphones you'll get at that price range
customer_reviews.text: The best headphones you'll get at that price range. The sound is flawless no matter if you keep a low volume or you bust you eardrums and the bass is just divine. The combination of them with a high quality device (I've been using them with my LG V20 smartphone, which is known for a great sound quality) will create an awesome experience. The headphones are of great quality materials and very comfortable and the supplied cable is long enough for any need that you may have. Bottom line, you'll get your money's worth with this product, guaranteed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product, but you need to know few things before buying
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product, but pay extra attention to the resistance, because it can be too high for some devices and watch how exactly you inputting Jack. Also, if it's too quiet try switcher on the earphone to disable bass or whatever.
customer_reviews.author: Evgenii

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great headphones, my son loved them, rich sound, so far have held up well.
customer_reviews.author: V Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Ok sound but very unconfortable after 30 min
customer_reviews.text: Nice sound but very unconfortable after 30 min. My ears hurt.
customer_reviews.author: Black Rhino

customer_reviews.title: Mainstream sound with Audiophile bass
customer_reviews.text: It's a good sounding headphone but if you're looking for a basshead headphone, this is not it. This has audiophile bass. It's good bass but lack volume and impact.
customer_reviews.author: K.hang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has not broken them yet and the sound quality is solid.
customer_reviews.author: Stacy Greenberg

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: i love my Custom Street Headphones.The vibrant base and crisp clear mid-range are excellent.Thank you beyerdynamic
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not even a single regret
customer_reviews.text: Great Headphones, awesome sound for money value. After a long research for this price ratio, i don't regret for a second for buying them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: just love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: just love these headphones. the selector on the headset makes a massive difference! Great way to switch eq while on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Henry McC

customer_reviews.title: not so fun to listen music I like more the fidelio m1
customer_reviews.text: What is the point of a custom sound slider if the headphone don't have bass at all? The slider just add a little of sub bass, but don't have any puchy bass so the drums dont sound at all In general this headphone just have highs, its not neutral, it have too much high and a little bass, not so fun to listen music I like more the fidelio m1, the drums sound spectacular and is more fun to listen.
customer_reviews.author: Nestor Daniel Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: Worst headphones ever
customer_reviews.text: I;Worst headphones ever! After less than 5 months, only 1 ear cup works. I tried replacing the wire, and that didn't work. I've had cheap Sony headphones from target that lasted longer.
customer_reviews.author: dms

customer_reviews.title: Great headphone
customer_reviews.text: Excelent sound and quality. The only design problem that I found was that the wire, conecting the right earphone with the "body" of the headphone, is to short so you have to be carefull or if would easily end up damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Average sound, good build quality.
customer_reviews.text: Gonna cut straight to the point. They look nice, build quality is good but the sound is average. Do not expect a lot from these guys, you get what you pay for basically. Ps. I am not an audiophile or anything, just writing down what I can hear and experience.
customer_reviews.author: JKK

customer_reviews.title: Great on the go headphones!
customer_reviews.text: Really practical on the go headphone! Amazing sound and comfort on my iPhone 6 Very impressive for the price point! Called beyerdynamic for product information before purchasing and was truly impressed with the customer service. Recommend the Custom Street and beyerdynamic products to all!
customer_reviews.author: headphone guru 18

customer_reviews.title: I bought 2!
customer_reviews.text: Love these headphones! They sound awesome. The slider feature works really well.
customer_reviews.author: Loren

product_meta.title: beyerdynamic Custom Street Headphones, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackThe Custom Street is ideal with mobile phones, mobile players or a stationary PC at home. A special feature of this headphone is the changeable sound which can be selected in three stages from a clear, analytical sound to a rich bass via the "CUSTOM Sound Slider" bass reflex vents at the housing shells. Another property of this "CUSTOM Sound Slider" feature is the more they are closed, the more they attenuate ambient noise considerably. Vice versa no music will penetrate to the outside which could disturb people in the vicinity. The CUSTOM STREET features a high-quality microphone. Via the remote control integrated in the cable you can accept and end phone calls. Depending on the software of the mobile phone or player (e.g. MP3 player) the remote control can be used for other functions such as music playback. The versatile design with replaceable accessories gives the headphone a special individuality. By purchasing colored covers, rings, ear and headband pads the user can change the look of the headphone at any time. The single-sided detachable cable is provided with a gold-plated mini jack plug (3.5 mm). It is available in different versions and lengths for most various applications. The movable yokes and adjustable headband of spring steel allow a perfect fit for each head size. Soft, replaceable ear and headband pads ensure a pleasant comfort of wearing. When not in use the housing shells can be folded inwards and the headphone is stored in the supplied case.
feature_bullets: Custom Sound Slider with the ability to change the sound anytime (closed, semi open, open design).Connectivity Technology: Wired
Includes detachable single button remote control with high quality microphone
32 ohm impedance for max volume with all portable players and smartphones
Closed Design for perfect isolation and includes hard carry case for easy storage
2 year manufacturer warranty only when purchased from an authorized beyerdynamic dealer
